# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGracePeriod | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGracePeriod ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGracePeriod 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGracePeriod

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGracePeriod
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppSubscriptionGracePeriodLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appsubscriptiongraceperiodlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod#see-also)

### [Getting subscription group and subscription grace period information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptionGracePeriod#Getting-subscription-group-and-subscription-grace-period-information)

[`Read the Billing Grace Period Value for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-subscriptiongraceperiod)Get the Boolean value that represents the grace period opt-in state for your app.[`List All Subscription Groups for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-subscriptiongroups)Get a list of subscription groups for a specific app.[`GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/subscriptionGroups`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-subscriptiongroups)
